beers.name: "3" 1349 Hoppy Tripel Ale
beers.description: Hoppy tripel ale brewed with the iconic black metal band 1349.

beers.name: 11. #IPA
beers.description: This modern IPA uses a blend of simcoe, amarillo, and citra hops. It is a bit hazy, but not like a New England IPA that is totally opaque. Rather than trying to make the richest flavor on the planet, it has a good balance between drinkability and juicy flavor, in line with all your favorite current IPAs.

beers.name: Aecht
beers.description: A smokey, round and dark Rauch Bier. Brewed with 80% beech wood smoked malt to give it its delicate smokieness.

beers.name: 1. Allfather
beers.description: Aquavit BA

beers.name: American IPA
beers.description: Lanzamos nuestra nueva cerveza American IPA con lúpulos Citra y Cascade además de SIN GLUTEN. Esta Ipa con aromas cítricos y un amargor balanceado se convertirá rápidamente en una de tus favoritas de la marca.

beers.name: Andromeda
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description: Brewed with our friends at Two Tides. Hopped with Nelson Hop Kief, Cryo Krush, Riwaka, and Pacific Sunrise hops

beers.name: Another Sun (2022)
beers.description:
Plum and raspberry mead.

The meads were fermented separately, and thoughtfully blended to what we felt was the perfect expression of both fruits. Bright, juicy and sour-sweet fruit, amped up by floral honey. 

Beautiful in the glass - Like a hazy sunset.

-------------------------- 2022 --------------------------

Honey variety:
Wildflower honey

Plum varieties:
Jubileum and Avalon

Raspberry variety:
Glen Ample


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Arctos Imperial Stout 2022 Bourbon Barrel Aged
Artekona
beers.description: Wild ale conditioned on blueberries

beers.name: 2. AUPA TOVARISCH
beers.description: Una cerveza que no olvidarás, una vez la pruebes soñarás con enrolarte en el oscuro ejército tovarisch. De profundo color negro opaco de cuerpo medio alto y cremoso. Marcado aroma tostado y torrefacto que se envuelve en toques licorosos y de frutos secos. Contundente y compleja en sabor con predominio de notas a café y chocolate con un amargor ligero y sutil en retrogusto.

beers.name: 15. Bånn Gass!
beers.description: Bånn Gass! er en vestkyststil dobbel IPA med tydelig bitterhet fra humlen. Ølet er brygget med norsk malt og spenstige humletyper fra USA og Australia.

beers.name: BASATIA
beers.description: Su carácter salvaje se debe a su gran cuerpo y cremosidad, Pásate al lado oscuro con esta bestialidad deliciosa llena de sabores a chocolate negro y café tostado.

beers.name: Beraskola
beers.description: Moscatel wine barrels fermented wild ale

beers.name: Big Banger 20
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description:
Po úspěchu naší session IPA Little Banger, která letos potěšila všechny milovníky lehkých, ale šťavnatých NEIPA, jsme věděli, že tohle pivo si zaslouží i svého velkého bráchu. Tak vznikl Big Banger – silnější, sebevědomější a chuťově ještě intenzivnější Double New England IPA, která už se s ničím nemaže. 

Do receptury jsme sáhli po peckách, které aktuálně svět moderního chmele nabízí. Základ tvoří Citra Cryo, koncentrovaná verze legendárního chmele, která přináší masivní nálož citrusů, limetek a tropického ovoce. Doplnili jsme ji o Superdelic, novější odrůdu z Nového Zélandu, která do piva vnáší jedinečné tóny červeného bobulového ovoce, manga a citrusových bonbónů. Třetím do party je Strata, chmel s takzvaným „dank“ charakterem – bylinný, divoký, s nádechem jahod a tropického ovoce. Tahle trojice se v pivu potkává v perfektně vyváženém aromatickém mixu, který exploduje hned s prvním douškem. 

Pivo má díky vysokému podílu ovesných surovin krémové, jemné tělo, které krásně nese veškerou tu chmelovou ovocnost, a zároveň působí překvapivě lehce, i když má 9 % alkoholu. Výsledkem je NEIPA, která nekompromisně ukazuje sílu moderního chmelení – šťavnatá, výrazná, a přitom pořád pitelná. 

Big Banger je přesně to, co slibuje jeho jméno. A taky jasný důkaz, že některé nápady si zaslouží vyrůst.

beers.name: Black & Deep
beers.description:
Ultima edición 2022.
Russian Imperial Stout con café de Colombia y envejecida con astillas de barrica de Whisky escocés.
Ilustración Antonio Bravo.

beers.name: Black Canvas
beers.description: Black Canvas is an American style porter. The dark malts gives the beer a complex aroma of chocolate, toffees and coffee. Pairs well with BBQ and chocolate desserts.

beers.name: Blue Lava
beers.description:
Pulpy smoothie sour with blueberry, mango and banana.

Dreamt up by Marlobobo. Brewed for us by the best smoothie makers in the biz, Elmeleven❤️

Flip the can a couple of times to mix up the smoothie before serving!

beers.name: Bourbon County Brand Cherries Jubilee Stout (2025)
beers.description:
(2025) As stout ages, Goose Island’s brewers often observe a range of fruit expressions that emerge from the barrel and from time itself. Inspired by the flambéed dessert classic Cherries Jubilee, 2025 Bourbon County Brand Cherries Jubilee Stout captures the essence of cognac-soaked cherries and caramelized citrus.

The beer began its aging journey in freshly emptied bourbon barrels, which impart rich layers of oak, warm vanilla and subtle baking spice. It was then finished in cognac barrels, adding elegant notes of dried fruit and contributing to a rich, full mouthfeel.

Following the aging process, the stout was blended with Montmorency cherries, citrus, and panela–resulting in a velvety, decadent beer with flavors of candied dark cherry, soft vanilla and a caramelized citrus finish. 14.5% ABV.

beers.name: Bourbon County Brand Chocolate Praline Stout (2025)
beers.description:
(2025) Bourbon County Brand Stout is a beer crafted for aging. Over time, Goose Island’s imperial stout undergoes an incredible transformation within the barrel. With patience and time, the beer not only absorbs the character of the freshly emptied bourbon barrels, but also develops expressions of toasted marzipan and dried fruit—signature to Original Stout.

Goose Island brings these flavors to the forefront with 2025 Bourbon County Brand Chocolate Praline Stout. First aged in freshly emptied bourbon barrels, this stout draws inspiration from the underlying decadence of chocolate, caramel, and roasted nuts found in Original. Layered with a blend of cocoa nibs, hazelnuts, almonds, cashews, and dates, this full-bodied stout showcases the classic flavors of a chocolate praline while embracing the subtle nuances imparted by the bourbon barrel. 14.6% ABV.

beers.name: 39. Bridge Please! 12
beers.description:
Gose je historický německý pivní styl známý svou lehce slanou a kyselou chutí. My jsme si ho vzali jako základ pro jedinečné mezinárodní dobrodružství. Společně s finským pivovarem Tuju který za námi dorazil osobně na vaření, jsme vytvořili pivo, které propojuje dvě pivní kultury – nejen nápadem, ale i chutí. 

Do receptury jsme zvolili suroviny, které jsou tradičně spojené s českou i finskou krajinou – finské brusinky, české i severské šípky a jalovec, který má v obou zemích silné kořeny v lidové gastronomii a bylinkářství. Společně tvoří chutě, které připomínají procházku podzimním lesem: jasná ovocná kyselost brusinek, jemná sladkokyselá hloubka šípků a bylinná, kořenitá linka jalovce. Vše završuje decentní minerální slanost, typická pro styl Gose. 

Bridge Please tak není jen pivo – je to symbol spojení. Most mezi minulostí a současností, mezi Finskem a Českem, mezi tradičními surovinami a moderní kreativitou. A tenhle most fakt stojí za to přejít.

beers.name: 25. Bryg 61
beers.description: Our first ever beer. It is called Bryg nr. 61 (brew no. 61), as it took 60 attempts before ending up with "Bryg nr. 61 - IPA". It is a fruity and hazy New England Pale Ale made primarily with Citra and Mosiac. Only very modest bitterness but high aroma of exotic fruits. Delicious for a summer day or a drink in the bar. It has now become a classic for us.

beers.name: Choco Orange Jelly Wheat Wine 2024
beers.description:
Cílem tohoto blendu tří pšeničných piv bylo napodobit slavné v čokoládě zalité vánoční gumové bonbóny. Po 30 měsících staření v dřevěných sudech jsme tedy přidali, pomeranče, pomorančovou kůru, kakaové boby a osladili javorovým sirupem. Výsledek je velmi zábavný a překvapivě pitelný. Dizajn etikety nám propůjčila teplická multidisciplinární umělkyně Hannah Saleh.

The aim of this blend of three wheat beers was to emulate the famous chocolate-covered Christmas gummies. So after 30 months of aging in wooden barrels, we added, oranges, orange peel, cocoa beans and sweetened with maple syrup. The result is very fun and surprisingly drinkable. The label design was lent to us by the Teplice-based multidisciplinary artist Hannah Saleh.

beers.name: 21. Cloud Gazing
beers.description: A modern West Coast IPA boasting a blend of hops that express evergreen forest, diesel, waxy citrus fruits and an approachable oily bitterness.

beers.name: Cocoa Vanilla Cardamom Sea Salt Stout 2025
Cocoa Vanilla Deth
beers.description: Barreling forth from the same French-oak-augmented blend of stout used in 2025 Vanilla Deth, this super-accessible rendition features Mexican cocoa nibs from our buds at Sleep Walk Chocolateria (by Dark Matter Coffee). With so much of the vanilla character coming from oak rather than just hand-split beans, you’ll also want to experience this beer at cellaring temp before the full breadth of aromatics presents itself. Far from any sort of adjunct bomb, a patient drinker will be rewarded with a dynamic sipping experience hitting on a wide range of familiar and comforting flavors and aromas as it warms - never letting any one dominate.⁠

beers.name: Dark Force
beers.description: From a country far, far away, comes the only imperial Wheat stout in the known universe. This Imperial really strikes back. Made with wheat malt and wheat yeast.

beers.name: Dark Inception #3 Salty Caramel Edition
beers.description: Dark Inception 3 salty caramel edition, is a bourbon barrel aged stout with salty caramel, and coffee from the Varghese family farm in the south of India. The coffee adds flavour to an already complex aroma with notes of salty caramel, chocolate, cocoa, and molasses.

beers.name: Dark Inception Tairora Edition
beers.description: Dark Inception is a Tairora coffee variant of our barrel aged stout Epilogue. The coffee was roasted by our friends Solberg & Hansen.

beers.name: Dee Dee
beers.description: OJO a esta EURO HAZY IPA, ¿Euro? Siiiiii , hemos utilizado lúpulos frescos modernos alemanes CALLISTA Y TANGO y hemos logrado un zumo fantástico alejado de los típicos lúpulos americanos.

beers.name: Defunked By Rackhouse
beers.description: A mixed fermentation sour brewed in collaboration with Nevel Wild Ales from the Netherlands. This Norwegian sour was brewed with locally foraged juniper and fermented with Kveik yeast, then aged in a Foeder for 18 months with our house mix culture. The result is a nuanced mixed fermentation sour with bright acidity, citrus fruits and wild funk.

beers.name: Double Dip BA 2023
beers.description: This beer is a blend of 3 different base beers, using some of the ingredients from Mash Test Yummies. It was a case of having some wood barrels available and some spare beer to trial together and see how it came out after a year of aging. We hope you'll agree that it worked out very nicely!

beers.name: Drink And Be Real Ø
beers.description: Naším cílem bylo uvařit nealkoholické pivo, které nebude jen stínem svých silnějších bratrů. A tak vzniklo Drink and Be Real – pivo s čistým charakterem, které si i přes nízký obsah alkoholu uchovává vše, co máme na ležáku rádi. Základem je chmelení dvěma moderními českými odrůdami: Saaz Comfort, který přináší jemnou hořkost a květinové tóny, a Saaz Shine, jenž přidává elegantní bylinný nádech a příjemnou svěžest. Kombinace nižší stupňovitosti a chmelení za studena pak zajišťuje skvělou pitelnost a překvapivou plnost. Dohromady tvoří chuť, která vás osvěží, potěší a přesvědčí, že i pivo bez alkoholu může být plné charakteru.

beers.name: 38. Drink and Drive Ø
beers.description:
Pro naše druhé nealko jsme vyslechli vaše prosby a našli způsob jak pasterovat plechovky, můžete se tak těšit na naše první plechovkové nealko. Pro tuto verzi jsme si vybrali styl, který je nám nejblíž, kalnou voňavou IPA s chmely Cryo Pop a Citra Spectrum. Tak ochutnejte a buďte zodpovědní!

For our second non-alcoholic beer we listened to your requests and found a way to pasteurize the cans, so you can look forward to our first canned AF beer. For this release we chose the style that is closest to our hearts, a hazy fragrant IPA with Cryo Pop and Citra Spectrum hops. So give it a taste and stay resposible!

beers.name: Europhoria
beers.description: Discover Europhoria, an exceptional medium-bodied IPA, skillfully brewed with a blend of unconventional aromatic German hops. Its appearance is a captivating dark yellow with a heavy haze, crowned by white foam, releasing aromas of fresh-cut grass, stone fruit, and a hint of citrus. The taste is a delightful balance of subtle sweetness and noticeable bitterness, wrapped in a medium body with moderate carbonation. Europhoria is not just a beer, it's a masterful fusion of traditional brewing and modern flavors, perfect for those who savor complexity and craftsmanship in their glass.

beers.name: Evergreen
beers.description: IPA with piney hops.

beers.name: 29. F.H. Prager Cider 11
beers.description: Jedenáctka je naše vlajková loď – charakterem nejpřístupnější varianta pro každého fanouška ciderů. Je polosuchá a jemnější. Obsah alkoholu je 4,5%

beers.name: Fanal CRYO Ugandan Vanilla (2024)
beers.description:
A freeze-concentrated cherry mead (or ice melomel if you will). Aged on a serious amount of Ugandan vanilla beans.

What happens when you take an already ultra-concentrated no-water melomel - and go even further by freeze-concentrating the cherry component, cutting its water content in half?

You get an insane saturation of pure cherry flavor, a glass-destroying lacing and an explosive acid/sweetness balance which let the flavors of pure cherry and honey linger forever.

Well, that's our opinion. What's yours?


------------------------------ 2024 ------------------------------


*276 bottles made*

Honey variety:
Wildflower from Lillesand and Konnerud

Cherry variety:
Fanal from Svelvik


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Fanal Free Jazz (2023)
beers.description:
Fanal, single variety cherry mead (Spontaneously fermented and terroir-driven).

No added water or yeast. Solely fermented from the yeast and bacteria naturally present on the cherries. The cherries had 14 days of skin contact, before only free-run juice was collected.

------------------------- 2023 --------------------------

Honey variety:
Late-harvested wildflower honey that was exceptionally dark, caramelly and complex.

Cherry variety:
Fanal


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Fragments of A Universe
beers.description: A selection of rye based hoppy mixed culture beer, aged between 3 and 16 Months in French oak Bariques and Puncheons.  Bottled with sugar for a natural carbonation.

beers.name: FREE LIFE
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description:
This new double New England IPA is inspired from one of the biggest hoppy brewery from Boston area. After Niclas trip to the US in the beginning of May this year he got inspiration of the heavy yellow/orange hue the beer looks like in the glass. This beer have a different malt bill than we usually do. Creamy, fluffy and with a balanced bitterness and dry hopped in two stages with Citra, Nelson Sauvin, Rakau, Citra cryo and
flowable Krush Hyperboost for flavours of orange juice, citrus and overripe mango.

beers.name: 30. Fresh Citra 2025 15
beers.description: Tohle je čerstvost dotažená do extrému. Fresh Citra 2025 je NEIPA postavená na chmelu Citra v unikátní podobě Cryo Fresh ™ – zmraženém a zpracovaném hned po sklizni a udržovaném v mrazu až do chvíle, kdy jsme ho nasypali do varny. Výrazně citrusová, šťavnatá, maximálně voňavá.

beers.name: FURRY LOVE
beers.description:
#FantasticSeries
Smoothie sour ale with nectarine. Collab w/ Trippin' Animals

beers.name: FWD (HBC 638)
beers.description:
A single hop beer brewed in collaboration with Yakima Chief Ranches and their FWD program. 

FWD was created as a two-way innovation channel, where products are trialed by the intended users (us the brewers) and feedback is collected and utilized (from YOU, the drinker), which safeguards the investment of farmer partners and provides brewers with tools to expand and evolve their products. Basically it's a hop research program and it's delicious and you get to try it before anyone else!

This FWD beer was dry hopped exclusively with a brand new, still unnamed hop, called HBC 638. Let us know what you think!

beers.name: 4. Fyr & Flamme
beers.description: Fyr og Flamme is a dry hopped IPA in the US West Coast style with an exceptional aroma and hop flavours from Citra and Amarillo hops.

beers.name: Glen Fyne Select (2022)
beers.description:
Raspberry mead with wildflower honey from Sveen Vestre and Glen Fyne raspberries from Dusgard. Handpicked and meticulously selected at perfect ripeness.

The result is an exceptionally pure and powerful expression of the raspberry variety "Glen Fyne". A variety that bursts with flavor and color.

If you don't take our word for it, NOFIMA (the Norwegian food research institute) recently tested them and considered them to be the sweetest and most aromatic compared to a bunch of other raspberries they had previously tested.

We got these bonkers flavorful raspberries a little further away from where we normally source our fruit. A couple of hours away, close to Norway's largest lake, "Mjøsa". To keep it "local", we paired them with some freshly extracted and deliciously fragrant wildflower honey from a beekeeper from the same area.

-------------------------- 2022 --------------------------

Honey variety:
Wildflower (Sveen Vestre - Løten)

Raspberry variety:
Glen Fyne (Dusgard - Moelv)


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Gose To Hollywood
beers.description: To Øl got startstruck. This is how we went to Hollywood. Salty, sour, light gose brewed with the best fruits California can offer. Best consumed on warm summer days.

beers.name: 36. Gosebumps Pastry Edition: Blue Lagoon
beers.description: Blue Curaçao, lime juice, vanilla & bubble gum gelato edition.

beers.name: Grains & Grapes 2022
beers.description: Abyste vytvořili něco opravdu unikátního, je třeba opustit zažité hranice a tak jsme k výrobě tohoto "hybridu" přistoupili zcela bez předsudků. Výchozí saison zrál 2 roky v sudech po červeném víně, jeden sud pak další 3 měsíce zrál na slupkách a druhý se šťávou vína odrůdy Cabernet Moravia, poté jsme oba sudy spojili v jednom nerezu, kde spolu stárli dalších 18 měsíců, aby se nakonec spojili a po dalším tříměsíčním zrání v lahvích skončil před vámi. Čtyřletá cesta je konečně u konce.

beers.name: Haandverkspils
beers.description:
En real Haandverklager brygget med de beste råvarer uten snarveier.

GLUTENFRI

beers.name: Hafgufa
beers.description: For the second edition of The Heart of Darkness, we brewed an imperial stout with our friends from Finback Brewery. The beer rested in rum barrels before we added coffe and hazelnut. Hafgufa is a seamonster from norse mythology sometimes described as a whale.

beers.name: Hazy Ways
beers.description: Hazy IPA single hopped with Idaho 7

beers.name: Himla Humla
beers.description: Himla Humla is a rich, hazy and alcohol free IPA. Vast amounts of Cascade, Vic Secret and Citra hops have been added late in the brewing process and in dry hopping. To contain proteins and give the final beer a nice mouth feel, this beer was not boiled during the brewing process.

beers.name: HOP APPETIT
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description: New juicy and fluffy double New England IPA. Big juicy mouthfeel from the heavy oat and wheat load in the mash. The beer is dry hopped with the new harvest of Motueka and Nelson Sauvin from Freestyle Hops that will bring out massive tropical flavors like pineapple, lime

beers.name: 20. Hops&Cops
beers.description: American IPA elaborada con lúpulos Mosaic y Citra, aromas a frutas tropicales, piña mango y maracuyá y un sabor cítrico y fresco con amargor equilibrado.

beers.name: Hoptopia
beers.description:
Densa, pegajosa y única, así es la nueva cerveza artesana Hoptopia DDH NEIPA, cerveza artesanal . Lúpulos utilizados: 

Strata: Strata es una variedad de lúpulo que empezó a comercializarse en el año 2008. Es un lúpulo procedente de Oregón con niveles de alfa-ácidos entre 11 y 12,5%. Este lúpulo aporta aromas a frutas tropicales, baya y aromas herbales. Se utiliza principalmente para la elaboración de cervezas IPA.

Mosaic: Mosaic es un lúpulo estadounidense conocido como super-Citra. Este lúpulo es muy rico en sabores cítricos como limón, mango, pino y frutas tropicales, además de tonos de carozo y hierbas. Se utiliza principalmente para dar amargor y aroma en cervezas Ales. 

Citra: Citra es un lúpulo estadounidense creado en el año 2007. Aporta aroma y amargor con toques de fruta y sabores a mango, maracuyá, lima y grosellas. Se usa para la elaboración de cervezas Ales.

beers.name: 31. Human Nature
beers.description: Human Nature is a light tropical fruit bomb with a tart but refreshing character, Guava juice blended at 20% total volume and a light Berliner style base make this beer the perfect session-able liquid...

beers.name: 17. Humlekanon - Classic Range
beers.description: Strågul IPA med tydelig bitterhet og stor smak av fruktige amrikanske humler. Den første i serien av klassikere som gjenskapes i ny og moderne drakt.

beers.name: If ÅBEN & Lervig Made A Stout...
beers.description: If ÅBEN and Lervig Made A Double Mashed Stout, this would be it. Deep black, thick and rich with layers of coffee, cacao and vanilla, topped with an espresso-like foam. Brewed together with friends from Lervig.

beers.name: In Extremis
beers.description: In Extremis is a powerful Belgian quadrupel that has matured for three years in American and French red wine barrels. The barrels add a slightly spicy and fruity touch of cranberry, blackberry and licorice.

beers.name: JAM JUICE
beers.description: Vegan

beers.name: Just Fruit (Raspberry, Orange, Banana)
beers.description:
Thick and Jammy.
With large additions of Raspberry, Orange & Banana.

beers.name: Kasteel Rouge
beers.description: Kasteel Rouge is a unique blend of Kasteel Donker and macerated cherries. The ruby red colour, the rich foamy head and the sweet attack result in a specialty beer with a balanced taste and subtle hints of cherries. This fruity beer is easily digestible for quite a strong beer and makes a great aperitif on a sunny terrace. Are you ready for la vie en Rouge?

beers.name: Kokemomo (2023)
beers.description:
Lingonberry mead aged on Ugandan vanilla beans.

Lingonberries are notoriously difficult to ferment due to their natural content of benzoic acid - one reason lingonberry jam keeps so well without added preservatives. Because of this, this melomel is crafted a bit differently than most of our fruit meads: water is added to help kickstart fermentation. It's still packed with fruit, though slightly less saturated with berries than our usual offerings.

Over 6 months of aging on Ugandan vanilla beans not only softens the tannic grip of lingonberries, but also amplifies their tart and fruity character. Paired with honey, it reveals notes of caramel and marshmallow fluff. 

------------------------------ 2023 ------------------------------

Honey variety:
Wildflower honey from Konnerud and Løten.

Lingonberry variety:
Wild lingonberries foraged from the forest (Sande and Kongsberg).


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Konrad’s Stout
beers.description: A Scandinavian inspired Imperial Stout. Konrad’s is a smooth, supple stout with lots of chocolate and coffee flavor with a touch of licorice. At 70IBU there is more than enough bitterness to balance out the sweetness.

beers.name: 32. Krahulík 11
beers.description:
Klasický spodně kvašený jedenáctistupňový ležák plzeňského typu z nejkvalitnějších sladů. Receptura je postavena na chmelu Harmonie. Příjemnou hořkostí vyzývá k opětovnému napití.

Classic bottom-fermented eleven-degree lager of the Pilsen type made of the highest quality malts. The recipe is based on Harmonie hops. With a pleasant bitterness, it calls for re-drinking.

beers.name: Kveik Culture: Brewski
beers.description: The first instalment of our 2024 collaboration series with long time friends, Brewski. A fruited sour with mango and vanilla fermented with Norwegian Kveik yeast.

beers.name: Le Grand Mélange By Rackhouse
beers.description:
This beer is truly old and has a few new parts too. Tucked in the furthest reaches of the brewery for years, a special blend of several of our mixed-culture projects has come to life with the addition of a brown strong ale and cherry juice from Telemark. Sweet notes of red fruits and vanilla meld seamlessly with wood and caramel flavours and a distinct sourness.


Serving: Flute glass. 4-5°C
2019 vintage

beers.name: Liam (2025)
beers.description:
My wife and I had our first kid in 2020. His name is Liam.

To mark the occasion, we named the next unnamed beer in the schedule after him. He’s getting older these days! He has lots of words and opinions. So we thought it was time to give him some creative control over his own beer!

We asked Liam to redesign both the label and the hops in the recipe to whatever his little heart desired. He tackled this assignment with vigorous enthusiasm and redesigned the label to have a “blue dino” on it and the beer to be hopped with Nelson Sauvin, Riwaka and Sabro hops!

It’s a beautiful label, and a great recipe that we couldn’t be more proud of him coming up with. We love ya buddy!

beers.name: Little Birdie
beers.description: Our sessionable hazy IPA packed with flavor and body. This one has been hopped with Strata and Strata CGX!!!  Fits perfectly in your golf bag.

beers.name: Low Five
beers.description: Low Five is an alcohol-free classic IPA with a slightly bitter hop character. Aroma and taste of citrus and passion fruit.

beers.name: Lumber For Ale (2025)
beers.description:
Did we trade beer for a sweet, wood stained table? Yes, yes we did. This was the beer we exchanged in a true throwback to a time before currency; where things such as lumber and ale ruled supreme.

You can still find this table in the beer bus to the left side of the bar/serving area. It is beautiful and was built by Mike's brother in law, Shavin. We appreciate him.

This years version of Lumber for Ale features a heavy dosing of Simcoe hops with an accent of Motueka. We taste dense notes of orange citrus, pineapple, and tropical fruit.

beers.name: Mandarin
beers.description:
Mandarin Sour je plný vůně čerstvě oloupaných mandarinek ponořených do kyseláče. Tohle je osvěžující pití nejen na léto.
--------
Deceptively simple, our Mandarin Sour is bursting with the distinctive aroma of freshly peeled mandarins, backed up by a refreshingly tart finish.

beers.name: Maracuja
beers.description:
Kyseláče v Ravenu milujeme zhruba stejně jako ovocná piva. Nejlepší je samozřejmě zkombinovat obojí. Toto pivo je plné maracuji, která je pro kyseláče jako stvořená. 
-------------
We have an undying passion for sour beers and for fruit beers here at Raven and it shows. Our Maracuja is bursting with juicy passion fruit and a refreshing tartness to leave you wanting more!

beers.name: Masala Chai Barley Wine 2024
beers.description:
30 měsíců nám trvalo, než jsme usoudili, že jsou naše bourbonové sudy plné barley wine připravené na vyprázdnění. Toto je blend tří sudů, které jsme ochutili javorovým sirupem a směsí indického koření Masala Chai. Etiketu pro nás vytvořila nadaná výtvarnice a naše lounská sousedka Lenka Kladivová.

It took us 30 months to finally decide that our bourbon barrels full of barley wine were ready to be emptied. This is a blend of three barrels that we flavored with maple syrup and a blend of Indian Masala Chai spices. The label was created for us by Lenka Kladivová, a talented artist and our neighbor from Louny.

beers.name: MC²
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description: MC² is Photon’s big brother. We literally took Photon’s hopping rate and squared it. This DIPA is our tribute to the amazing relationship that energy and mass are balanced, proportional to the speed of a photon squared. It pours a hazy tangerine color, releasing bright tropical notes of mango, pineapple, and apricot. MC² tastes like succulent mango juice loaded with chewy hop resins. It’s very drinkable for 8.0%; be careful, this one can sneak up on you.

beers.name: Mexican Hot Chocolate BA Imperial Stout (2022)
Midnight Snack
beers.description: Because self-control is overrated. Midnight Snack is a rich, velvety dessert stout loaded with chocolate, caramel, and a big hit of peanut butter. It’s thick, sweet, and unapologetically over the top — like raiding the cupboard after hours and finding everything you ever wanted in one sip.

beers.name: Mingle (October 2025)
beers.description:
Mingle is our series of beers where we blend whatever hops we feel like to see if they have chemistry with each other.

It’s been a minute since we’ve done a mingle and that’s largely because we’d been through most hop blends we found novel and interesting…. Until now! 

Hopped with the explosive trio of Sabro, Dolcita, and Talus this is one of those beers that doesn’t quite taste like any other. All three hops are somewhat related to one another (Talus being the daughter of Sabro and dolcita basically being Sabro adjacent in flavor terms) and come together to make a monster beer replete with notes of fuzzy peach, coconut, ruby red grapefruit and juicy tangerine.

beers.name: Miracle Double IPA
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description: Miracle is an 8.3% DIPA, all whirlpool hopped with Strata & Columbus and then dry hopped to hell with Ekuanot, Idaho 7 and some Simcoe Dynaboost.

beers.name: Misanthropic Topographer (2022)
beers.description:
Blackberry and strawberry mead.

A blackberry mead and strawberry mead were fermented separately, and thoughtfully blended to what we felt was the perfect expression of both berry varieties together.

A thick and velvety concoction of fresh, jammy blackberries, strawberries and wildflower honey.

-------------------------- 2022 --------------------------

Honey variety:
Wildflower

Blackberry variety:
Loch Ness

Strawberry variety:
Polka


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Mumbo Jumbo #1: Passion Fruit, Guava, Raspberry
beers.description: This beer is part of the big fruited gose series, Mumbo Jumbo. Every Mumbo Jumbo is made with heaps and heaps of fruit. This full-bodied, lightly sour and salty gose is brewed with passion fruit, guava and raspberry.

beers.name: 7. Mumbo Jumbo #7
beers.description: This beer is part of the big fruited gose series; Mumbo Jumbo. Inspired by the piña colada, this bright gose brings together pulpy pineapple, creamy coconut, zesty lime and a chef's kiss of vanilla.

beers.name: 22. Narangi
beers.description: Mosaic

beers.name: 33. Nectar of Happiness 17
beers.description:
Nejprodávanější new england ipa pivovaru. V chuti i vůni výrazné tóny ananasu, manga a žlutého melounu.

V půlce roku 2019 vyhlášeno serverem Untappd.com nejlepším pivem v České republice.

Jedná se o námi zamilovaný styl NEIPA, pro který je typické extrémní množství použitého aromatického chmele v pozdních fázích výroby, to z důvodu, abychom dosáhli maximální možné ovocitosti ve vůni i v chuti, ale hořkost stále drželi na uzdě. Dále se používají ovesné vločky, které zjemní strukturu těla a pivo je pak krásně sametové. A v neposlední řadě, hraje významnou roli speciální kmen kvasnic.
___

The brewery's best selling New England IPA. In taste and aroma, distinct notes of pineapple, mango and yellow melon.

In the middle of 2019, Untappd.com announced it as the best beer in the Czech Republic.

This is the NEIPA style we love, which is characterized by the extreme amount of aromatic hops used in the late stages of production, achieving maximum possible fruitiness in the aroma and taste.

beers.name: Nectarous Neighbours (2024)
beers.description:
Partially cryo-concentrated cherry mead with Stevns cherries from the renowned Frederiksdal Estate in Denmark and our favourite cherry orchard in Norway. 

Paired with dark forest honey (honeydew) and wildflower honey from our beekeepers in Norway.

Dreamt up with the Mikkeller team! How could we not use Frederiksdal cherries when doing a fruit-forward collaboration with them. A long time ago I was introduced to the unique cherry variety "Stevns" after trying the legendary SpontanCherry Frederiksdal from Mikkeller. That further got me into Frederiksdal's extraordinary wines, and guess my surprise when I found out I could get the same variety in my neighbouring town.

Over ten years later I received 500 kg of frozen cherries from Frederiksdal, and it feels like coming full circle doing a mead with both cherries together!

A two-week long maceration gave loads of soft, supple tannins and color, and only free-run juice was collected. As a cherry on top, the Norwegian cherry part was cryo-concentrated. 

It's a cherry bomb without a doubt. But the forest honey shines through beautifully and puts its marks on the mead with sweet notes of dark caramel and chocolate. While still retaining a lot of acidity!


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: No Worries Grapefruit
beers.description: No Worries Grapefruit, non-alc beers are the new soda! So we took our No Worries NA Pale Ale and stepped it up a notch with a touch of grapefruit. We love our grapefruit beers so why not be able to enjoy one before you drive home from a meeting and not worry about it. This non-alc beer has all the taste and mouth feels of a 5% fruity pale ale without the need for pain killers in the morning.

beers.name: No Worries Original
beers.description: Need a worry free alcohol free beer? We got it for you. A lightly hopped and pleasantly refreshing pale ale, fermented with a brewers yeast which cant ferment Maltose. Tasting like a low abv beer due to this process you can enjoy the beer wihtout the effect.

beers.name: Oak-aged Pilsner By Rackhouse
beers.description: With a love for wood aged beer in Rackhouse we decided to age our Pilsner in one of our foeders for 6 months which has resulted in a rustic wood aged Pilsner that is refreshing yet complex. With a balanced malt character, dry finish and a slight funk edge from the wood aging. We are excited to experiment more with this style.

beers.name: Omniversal Escapism (2022)
beers.description:
Raspberry mead aged in old Plantation rum barrels for 11 months.

-------------------------- 2022 --------------------------

Barrel origin:
Very old Plantation rum from Barbados (11 months aging)
*These barrels originates from around the 90's. They were used to make whiskey by Willowbank Distillery before they were shipped to Barbados to further age rum. Willowbank ceased operation all the way back in 1997!*

Honey variety:
Wildflower

Raspberry variety:
Glen Ample


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Origins: Columbia
beers.description:
Série Coffee Stoutů vařená s použití výběrových kávových zrn z celého světa. Čerstvě praženou kávu nám s láskou připravují naši přátele z Pappa Coffee.
...
A series of Coffee Stouts brewed using aromatic coffees from around the world hand-roasted by our great friends at Pappa Coffee

beers.name: 24. Otis
beers.description: Amarillo & Krush

beers.name: Paragon 2021 By Rackhouse
beers.description:
BARLEY WINE AGED IN BOURBON BARRELS FOR 18 months

Paragon 2021 showcases our patient and considered approach to tending nearly 60 different bourbon barrels for over 12 months. This edition of our distinguished barley wine displays strong notes of caramel and oak-ageing with hints of tabacco, fruit cake and vanilla. The finish is distinctly bourbon forward and complex with a balanced bitterness and perceived sweetness that gives way to a warming sensation from the 13.8% alcohol.

beers.name: Paragon 2022 By Rackhouse
beers.description: Paragon 2022 brings together bourbon barrel-aged barley wine and masterfully expresses notes of dried figs, raisins, and vanilla, complemented by caramel, toffee, and chocolate notes from the malt. The result is a symphony of flavors that envelops your palate, disguising the alcohol content with finesse. It’s a testament to our dedication to the old style and the artistry of brewing, encapsulated in every bottle.

beers.name: 12. Perler For Svin
beers.description: Loaded with Azzaca, Mosaic and Simcoe hops, this low-bitterness IPA has an extremely juicy aroma to complement the complex mouthfeel. Our extensive dry-hopping and fermentation regiment ensures we archieve Garden of Eden juiciness. The resulting flavour is in-your-face-tropical mango and lychee with stone fruit finishing notes.

beers.name: Philanthropic Typographer (2022)
beers.description:
Oak-aged blackberry and strawberry mead with vanilla beans.


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Pickle Juice!
beers.description: Pucker up! Here is our take on a Cucumber and Dill Gose - Pickle Juice!

beers.name: 3. Porter
beers.description:
In this quite dark ale, dark malts provide flavors of coffee and dried fruit. 

Recommended serving temperature 10°C/50°F.

beers.name: Prince (Memorial Series)
beers.description: Gose elaborada con sal de Añana y Kiwi

beers.name: PULPO FICTION (2022)
beers.description:
Blend of wildberry mead and bourbon barrel-aged imperial stout with Ugandan vanilla and Spanish squid ink.

An experimental braggot that came to life after trying different blends of mead and barrel-aged beer. For this release we ended up blending a strawberry-forward wildberry mead with our bourbon BA vanilla imperial stout (Golden Tears). The blend surprised us with some subtle umami notes that we wanted to highlight with a small dose of umami-rich squid ink.

-------------------------- 2022 --------------------------

Honey variety:
Wildflower

Fruit varieties:
Strawberry (Polka)
Wild blueberry (bilberries)
Aronia
Apple (Discovery)
Plum (Jubileum)
Pear (Celina)

The strawberry, wild blueberry and aronia is supported by a blend of apple, plum and pear juice that was used instead of water.


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the honey and fruit*

beers.name: PURPLE HAND
beers.description:
Black currant
Guava
Yuzu

beers.name: Ratio of Exchange
beers.description: A collaboration of Belgian tradition and modern mixed culture brewing. After a visit to our much admired friends at Oud Beersel in Belgium, a plan was hatched to blend our two beers together. Comprising 33% Lambic, 33% of our oak aged wild ale, and the rest being hoppy 3 month old Saison. The character of both breweries shines equally well. Packaged with raw honey in green glass bottles for a natural carbonation.

beers.name: Rigs and Ratlines
beers.description: Rigs and Ratlines is a blend of wild fermented vintages matured on oak with raspberry added before bottling. This gives a semi-dry and balanced acidity with a full mouthfeel and ﬂavors of raspberries, cloudberries, citrus, sour apricot and grapes.

beers.name: 34. Robin 12
beers.description:
Velmi pitelné pivo typu American Pale Ale s jemnou pryskyřičnou linkou z chmele Simcoe doprovázenou šťavnatou ovocitostí chmele Citra. Pro větší jemnost se do piva přidávají ovesné vločky.

Very drinkable beer of the American Pale Ale type with a fine resin line from Simcoe hops accompanied by the juicy fruitiness of Citra hops. Oatmeal is added to beer for greater softness.

beers.name: 40. Roggenbier 13
beers.description:
Roggenbier, tedy žitné pivo, má v Německu dlouhou historii, kterou však na čas přerušily pivovarnické předpisy i změny chutí. A protože náš hlavní sládek Martin je milovníkem žita, tak jsme se rozhodli tenhle zapomenutý styl přivést zpět na světlo světa v jeho co nejautentičtější podobě.
Použití vysokého podílu žitného sladu – v našem případě přes 50 %, který s nižším obsahem lepku a vyšším podílem beta-glukanů dává pivu plné a přirozeně zakalené tělo s charakteristickou chlebovostí, kořenitostí a jemnou viskozitou, která Roggenbier odlišuje od klasických ječných piv. Kvasili jsme klasickými svrchními kvasnicemi na bavorská pšeničná piva. Ty dodávají typický esterovo-fenolický profil – čekej jemné tóny banánů, hřebíčku a vanilky, které krásně doplňují kořenitost žita. Díky jemnému chmelení žateckým poloraným červeňákem jsme udrželi nízkou hořkost a nechali vyniknout sladové tóny. 
Archiv Roggenbier je pivo, které nevyhledává pozornost, ale zaslouží si ji. Tichý společník pro dlouhé večery, který s každým douškem vypráví příběh málem zapomenutého pivního řemesla.

beers.name: Sandamendi
beers.description: Mixed fermentation wild ale

beers.name: SCHAARBEE CRYO (2024)
beers.description:
A freeze-concentrated cherry mead (or ice melomel if you will).

What happens when you take an already ultra-concentrated no-water melomel - and go even further by freeze-concentrating the cherry component, cutting its water content in half?

You get an insane saturation of pure cherry flavor, a glass-destroying lacing and an explosive acid/sweetness balance which let the flavors of pure cherry and honey linger forever.

Well, that's our opinion. What's yours?


------------------------------ 2024 ------------------------------


*159 bottles made*

Honey variety:
Wildflower from Tønsberg and Lillesand

Cherry variety:
Schaarbeekse cherries from Lindheim, Telemark.


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Schmoojee Mango Colada
beers.description:
We like to celebrate our beautiful Hatfield January weather by making a couple colada smoothie beers. Mango has been one of the top rated smoothie sours in the world since 2019 or so. We’ve been using the same mango suppliers since then. Super gooey mango, light pineapple and our dialed in coconut puree.
No lactose.

beers.name: SHADE
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description: Brand new juicy double New England IPA. The beer is brewed with a lot of oats and wheat for a fluffy mouthfeel. Dry hopped in two stage with the new harvest of Peacharine and Nelson Sauvin from Freestyle Hops, together with Citra cryo and the flowable potent Hyperboost Krush. All the hops together will bring out flavors of peaches, grapes, bubblegum and some dankness.

beers.name: 9. Snublejuice
beers.description:
Gluten Free Session IPA

“Snuble” means “stumble” “Juice” means “highly aromatic irresistible refreshing liquid”. We’ve fallen head over heels for this beer. We know you will too. An India Pale Ale Dry Hopped with El Dorado, Mosaic and Simcoe. Oh, and it’s Gluten Free.

beers.name: Sounds Good BA 2022
beers.description: A beer that tastes even better than it sounds. Our barrel aged Imperial stout we made in collaboration with the talented people across the pond, Fuerst Wiacek. Aged in Bourbon barrels for 13 months, with additions of pecan nuts, cacao nibs, vanilla, and cinnamon.

beers.name: Sour 12 Calamansi
beers.description:
Úplně nový Sour do jedné za našich nejpopulárnějších rodin. Tentokrát s filipínským citrusem Kalamansi, který pivu předává vyšší kyselost a příjemnou ovocnou šťavnatost. Série Sour 12 je tu s námi už pěkných pár let a jsme rádi, že vám může být stále v nových kabátech partnerem pro vaše horké dny.

Brand new Sour to one of our most popular families. This time with Calamansi, a Filipino citrus that gives the beer a higher acidity and a nice fruity juiciness. The Sour 12 series has been with us for quite a few years now, and we're glad to have it as a partner for your hot days, still in its new coats.

beers.name: Stevnsberry (2024)
beers.description:
Stevnsbær, single variety cherry mead.

The Stevns variety is known for its small size, deep red/burgundy color and its distinctively complex flavor. It shouldn't be taken lightly that it has been named "Nordic Grape" by many.

Expect a cherry forward, semi-sweet mead with a lingering finish of honey, cherries, and notes of almond, cinnamon and vanilla. The well integrated tannins from cherry skins and oak ties it all together.

-------------------------- 2024 --------------------------

This vintage is a blend of two threads. One that has aged in stainless steel and one that has conditioned on oak staves for about 6 months, adding some extra volume, structure and vanilla notes to the final blend.

Honey variety:
Wildflower from Konnerud

Cherry variety:
Stevnsbær from Svelvik


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: Stevnsberry Cuvée (2022/2023)
beers.description:
Stevnsbær, single variety cherry mead.

Blend of three threads:
#1 Stevnsberry (2022)
#2 Stevnsberry (2023)
#3 Stevnsberry (2022) - conditioned on oak staves for over a year

This special version of Stevnsberry is meticulously blended from two different vintages and an oak aged thread. Giving it a wider range of complexity and flavor than the original release. Thread #1 brought age and smoothness, with some lightly dried fruit notes to the blend. Thread #2 brought freshness, a vibrant acidity and new life to the blend. While thread #3 tied everything together by lifting the mouthfeel, giving it additional structure and adding some vanilla notes from the oak.


-------------------------- 2022/2023 --------------------------

Honey variety:
Norwegian wildflower honey harvested from three different areas (flavors ranging from mild, fruit-driven honey - to dark, malty and mega complex honey harvested late in the season)

Cherry variety:
Stevnsbær harvested in 2022 and 2023


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the ingredients*

beers.name: 5. Stevnsbær 2021
beers.description: Danish Wild Ale macerated with freshly harvested Danish Stevns cherries from Frederiksdal.

beers.name: Stolen Quince And Pear
beers.description:
Stolen Quince & Pear is a tantalizing kettle-soured beer that brings together the irresistible sweetness of ripe quince and pear, with a smooth touch of vanilla. 

The tart, refreshing sourness creates a perfect balance, allowing the fruit to shine while the vanilla adds a creamy finish. Part of the Stolen Fruit series, this brew captures the essence of forbidden indulgence.

beers.name: 16. Storweiss
beers.description: Storweiss henter inspirasjonen sin fra de sydtyske hveteølene fra Bavaria. Det er et rent friskt og smakfullt hveteøl som passer både til norsk sjømat, grillmat og en god salat. Eller bare i store glass sammen med gode venner!

beers.name: Stout Laphroaig 2025
beers.description: Uvařený v roce 2022 a zrán 2,5 roku v sudech po skotské whisky Laphroaig z ostrova Islay

beers.name: Stout Woodford 2025
beers.description: Imperial Stout aged in Woodford Reserve barrels

beers.name: Stripped Craft
beers.description: We believe beer without alcohol should taste like beer. Nøgne Ø Stripped Craft is stripped of alcohol, but still gives you the full beer flavour. The addition of fresh lime juice makes this beer a preferred drink on a hot summer day. Or at any time on any other day, as well.

beers.name: Svart/Hvit
beers.description: Brewing a non alcohol beer to challenge the taste buds and also go well with food is a challenge. Nøgne Ø Svart/Hvit is in our opinion such a beer. Dark, flavorful and exhilarating. Diversity? Yes, please!

beers.name: Sweet Tooth
beers.description: A liquid treat for those who never skip dessert. Sweet Tooth swirls creamy coconut and soft vanilla into a thick, silky stout that’s all about indulgence. Sweet dreams are made of this.

beers.name: T-Shirt Exchange
beers.description: A vibrant IPA, brewed with Sureshot, Rivington Brewing Co. and Lervig. Notes of crushed citrus, overripe pineapple, grape must and tart passionfruit — lifted by a terpene-enhancing yeast strain.

beers.name: 28. The All Seeing Eye
beers.style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beers.description: Double IPA hopped with Simcoe, Citra and Kohatu.

beers.name: The Parasol Paradox
beers.description:
Pulpy smoothie sour with dark berries and tropical coconut cream.

Strawberry
Pineapple
Raspberry
Blueberry
Coconut

Dreamt up by Marlobobo. Brewed for us by the best smoothie makers in the biz, Elmeleven❤️

Flip the can a couple of times to mix up the smoothie before serving!

beers.name: The Space Between the Stars
beers.description: A refined  blend of 3 year old Bourbon Barrel aged stout (70%) and three year old Bourbon barrel aged barley wine (30%). The space between the stars refers to the interstellar space between star systems and their atmoshpheres  in a galaxy, and not the intergalactic void.

beers.name: THERE’S NO BETTER RHYME. RASPBERRY, GINGER & LIME
Traditional Tales: Rum Rendezvous (2022)
beers.description:
Rum barrel-aged traditional mead with wildflower honey.

Traditional Tales is a limited series of barrel-aged traditionals where the barrel is the main author. Quality honey, booze and oak melds together to create a sweet, complex concoction made for sipping.

----------------------- Rum Rendezvous (2022) -----------------------

Alluring scent of floral honey, vanilla and coconutty rum notes remindful of piña colada. The sweet, flowery honey is kept in balance by the firm booze character and the lightly tannic finish from the aging in oak. Sweet notes of tropical rum, fluffy vanilla custard and brown sugar lingers forever.

Barrel origin:
Very old Plantation rum from Barbados (11 months aging)
*These barrels originates from around the 90's. They were used to make whiskey by Willowbank Distillery before they were shipped to Barbados to further age rum. Willowbank ceased operation all the way back in 1997!*

Honey variety:
Wildflower (Sveen Vestre - Løten)


*The vintage year refers to the harvest year of the honey*

beers.name: Trouble Maker
beers.description: Toasty, nutty, and just the right amount of wrong. Trouble Maker layers candied pecan and golden graham cracker over deep roasted malt for a full-bodied stout that’s both sweet and mischievous. You know you shouldn’t, but you just can’t help yourself. Rules are for other people anyway.

beers.name: 37. Valhalla Barrel Aged House Stout 2025
beers.description:
Limitovaná várka připravená výhradně pro hospodu Valhalla. Tento stout zrál přes dva roky v sudu po bourbonu Woodford Reserve Double Oak.
Dlouhé zrání přineslo plnost, jemné tóny dřeva a vyzrálý charakter, který dělá z každého doušku malou odměnu.
Plněn v 1/2023, stočen v 11/2025.

beers.name: Vin Santo Sour By Rackhouse
beers.description: A Rackhouse sour aged for 2 years in Vin Santo dessert wine barrels from Italy. The result is vibrant sour notes froum our house mixed culture, vinous oak, honey and sweet dried fuits. A truly sacred Rackhouse sour.

beers.name: W
beers.description: W is a fruited sour that wonders. What if flavour didn’t need alcohol to leave an impression? Full of mango, papaya and passionfruit. Vibrant, tangy and alcohol-free. The second step in the WHY series.

beers.name: 8. X-MAS QUAD BA (2022)
beers.description: Belgian quadruple with nutmeg, cinnamon, staranis, and orange peel.

beers.name: Y
beers.description:
Our first step into the world of non-alcoholic brewing has everything you would expect from a modern IPA but with a modest ABV and no compromise on flavour.
This tiny IPA tastes like pink lemonade, creamy oats and fresh citrus.

beers.name: 18. Yule Malt 2024
beers.description: This is a To Øl classic that we brew every Christmas since we just can’t get enough of it. A 12.3% heavy, sweet, dark as sin stout with an abundance of lactose for a truly gluttonous, naughty beverage. This version of the Yule Malt was matured in both cognac and bourbon barrels. This gives the Imperial Stout more depth, intensity and silkiness. A wonderful beer that is ideal as a dessert on Christmas Eve or as a companion for the rest of the evening.
